org.eclipse.scada.da.client

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Connection

    public interface Connection
extends Connection
    A DataAccess (DA) connection.

    • Method Detail

      • browse

        void browse(Location location,
          BrowseOperationCallback callback)
        Browse a server folder for items. The operation will return immediately.
        Parameters:
        location - The path to browse
        callback - The callback that shall receive notifications of the operation

      • write

      • setFolderListener

        FolderListener setFolderListener(Location location,
                               FolderListener listener)
        Set the listener for this location.
        Parameters:
        location - The location for which to set the listener
        listener - The listener to set
        Returns:
        The previous set listener or null if there was no previous listener

        ItemUpdateListener setItemUpdateListener(java.lang.String itemId,
                                       ItemUpdateListener listener)
        Set the listener for this item.
        Parameters:
        itemId - The item for which to set the listener
        listener - The listener to set
        Returns:
        The previous set listener or null if there was no previous listener

      • getExecutor

        java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService getExecutor()
        Retrieve the executor that is currently set
        Returns:
        the currently used executor. Implementations must never return null
